import './InfoBoard.css'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faUser, faCartShopping, faCircleDollarToSlot, faWallet } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import axios from '../../util/axios'; import Card from '../UI/Card'; import APIContext from '../../store/API-context'; const InfoBoard = () => { const { transactions, users } = useContext(APIContext); console.log(transactions); return
users

{users.length}
orders

{transactions.length}
earnings

$ {transactions.map(i => i.price).reduce((cur, mov) => cur + mov, 0)}
balance

$ {transactions.map(i => i.price).reduce((cur, mov) => cur + mov, 0) / 30}
} export default InfoBoard;
